Member Function Documentation

unsigned int XalanNodeList::getLength ( ) const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the number of nodes in the list.

The range of valid child node indices is 0 to length-1 inclusive.

Reimplemented in XalanNodeListDummy, XalanNodeListSurrogate, XercesNodeListWrapper, and XercesNodeListBridge.

XalanNode * XalanNodeList::item ( unsigned int index ) const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the indexth item in the collection.

If index is greater than or equal to the number of nodes in the list, this returns null.

Parameters:
index   Index into the collection.
Returns:
The node at the indexth position in the NodeList, or null if that is not a valid index.

Reimplemented in XalanNodeListDummy, XalanNodeListSurrogate, XercesNodeListWrapper, and XercesNodeListBridge.
